items.sentence: Tom is tired of being compared to his brother.
Radiation levels are within acceptable limits.
Maybe Tom should\'ve stayed with the children.
I think we should tell Tom to stop doing that.
Tom says that he knows three girls named Mary.
I\'m not very interested in French literature.
Tom works in the tallest building in the city.
Tom was somehow able to swim across the river.
When are you going to consider me your friend?
There\'s a leak in the roof that needs fixing.
Tom\'s pride won\'t let him admit he\'s wrong.
I can\'t figure out how to say this in French.
I thought you said you were scared to do that.
I wouldn\'t forgive Tom even if he apologized.
Do you know what Tom is going to do next year?
Do you know what would happen if you did that?
It\'s been almost a year since I\'ve seen Tom.
It\'s been three months since Tom\'s accident.
Are you sure Tom wasn\'t the one who did that?
Tom doesn\'t want his son to turn out like me.
